AUTHOR: FlapJack
NAME: ColorMe
SHORT: Allow users to manage the color of their own name.
DESCRIPTION:
Creates a custom role for each user and allows them to manage the color of their own name.
To use this cog properly, if you have roles with elevated permissions (i.e. admins, mods), these users will need special roles placed ABOVE their admin or mod roles, since only top role determines the name color. Or, you can remove admin and mod roles completely and just make sure each user's custom role has the right permissions.
Use [p]colorme protect <role> to prevent color changes.

Dependencies: None
